definitions.definition: (of a number of people) fill (a space) almost completely, leaving little or no room for movement.

definitions.example: people who had seen him were able to give a description

definitions.definition: a type or class of people or things.
definitions.example: it is laughably easy to buy drugs of all descriptions

definitions.definition: a waterless, desolate area of land with little or no vegetation, typically one covered with sand.
definitions.example: the desert of the Sinai peninsula is a harsh place

definitions.definition: like a desert.
definitions.example: overgrazing has created desert conditions

definitions.definition: abandon (a person, cause, or organization) in a way considered disloyal or treacherous.
definitions.example: he deserted his wife and daughter and went back to England

definitions.definition: (of a place) empty of people.
definitions.example: deserted beaches of soft sand

definitions.definition: abandon (a person, cause, or organization) in a way considered disloyal or treacherous.
definitions.example: he deserted his wife and daughter and went back to England

definitions.definition: do something or have or show qualities worthy of (a reaction which rewards or punishes as appropriate).
definitions.example: the referee deserves a pat on the back

definitions.definition: a decorative pattern.
definitions.example: pottery with a lovely blue and white design

definitions.definition: purpose or planning that exists behind an action, fact, or object.
definitions.example: the appearance of design in the universe

definitions.definition: decide upon the look and functioning of (a building, garment, or other object), by making a detailed drawing of it.
definitions.example: a number of architectural students were designing a factory

definitions.definition: a plan or drawing produced to show the look and function or workings of a building, garment, or other object before it is made.
definitions.example: he has just unveiled his design for the new museum
